name: WL Toys Sky Dancer 4 Channel Fixed Pitch Helicopter Ready to Fly 2.4Ghz
description:
This is the latest WL TOYS creation, the new Sky Dancer Max helicopter. Made with aircraft grade aluminum with composite materials. Lightweight yet strong to take the abuse from learning how to fly. With its large diameter main blades and onboard gyro the Sky Dancer provides stable and precise flight characteristics. Equipped with a 2.4ghz radio system the Sky Dancer ensures positive machine to user interface connection. The Sky Dancer is a true fixed pitch helicopter providing all movements of flight. You can strafe left and right, pitch forward and back, yaw left and right, and rotate clockwise and counter-clockwise. The power is derived from a 7.4v 850mah battery system and provides about 8 minutes of flight time. 

WL Toys is known for creating excellent flying choppers and quads at an extremely great value. This Sky Dancer is no exception. The Sky Dancer is fully assembled and ready to fly out of the box. Charge her up and start flying.

 

Features:
Mode 2 Transmitter Setup
2.4ghz Radio System
Transmitter can be used for V911, V929, V939, V949
Li-Po powered for increased power and flight time
Large rotor diameter is inherently more stable
Extra Tail Blade
Extra Main Blades

Specifications:
Main rotor diameter: 15.7"
Tail rotor diameter: 5"
Remote distance: about 100yards
Flight altitude: about 100yards
Flying time: about 8 minutes
Charging time: about 120 minutes
Transmitter battery: 4 x AA Battery (not included)
Length: 56cm
Width: 10.5cm
Height: 20cm
Main rotor blade diameter: 53cm
Tail rotor blade diameter: 16cm
Battery: 7.4v 1500mAh Li-Po
Weight: 15.8oz

name: MJX F645 2.4ghz 4 Channel Fixed Pitch Ready to Fly Helicopter
description:
The MJX F645 is a medium sized fixed pitch 4 channel helicopter. It is constructed with aircraft grade aluminum with composite materials. Lightweight yet strong to take the abuse from learning how to fly. With its large diameter main blades and onboard gyro the F645 provides stable and precise flight characteristics. The MEMS Gyro system enables the helicopter to fly stable in outdoor conditions. When the helicopter experiences crosswind the gyro allows the helicopter to stabilize and improve flight. Equipped with a fully proportional 2.4ghz radio system the F645 ensures positive machine to user interface connection. The F645 is a true fixed pitch helicopter providing all movements of flight. You can strafe left and right, pitch forward and back, yaw left and right, and rotate clockwise and counter-clockwise. The power is derived from a 7.4v 1500mah battery system and provides about 8-10 minutes of flight time. 

MJX is known for creating excellent flying machines at an extremely great value. This F645 is no exception. The F645 is fully assembled and ready to fly out of the box. Charge her up and start flying.

Features:
Mode 2 Transmitter Setup
2.4ghz Radio System
Li-Po powered for increased power and flight time
Large rotor diameter is inherently more stable
Extra Tail Blade
Extra Main Blades

Specifications:
Main rotor diameter: 21.2"
Tail rotor diameter: 5.7"
Remote distance: about 100yards
Flight altitude: about 100yards
Flying time: about 8-10 minutes
Charging time: about 120 minutes
Transmitter battery: 4 x AA Battery (not included)
Helicopter battery: 7.4V 1500mah Li-Po (rechargable)
Weight: 10.5oz
Length: 27.5"
Width: 4"
Height: 7.8"

name: F163 Fire Wolf 4.5CH RC Dual side-fly Helicopter RTF w/ 27MHz Transmitter + Built in Gyro
description:
The most unique dual side-fly helicopter is here! This detailed F163 Fire Wolf is beautifully designed and made in high strength metal, so it can survive more bumps and fights than other competitors, at the same time perfect for beginners to get into their new hobby.

Thanks to the built in Gyro it can hover and stay in the air impressively, at the same time it flies stably and quietly. Combined with the most advanced battery replacement capability, you don’t want to wait to get your hands on this amazing RC helicopter.


Features
World exclusive Dual side-fly mode sideways movement
Fly in the Dark: Dazzling color LED light
The battery of the helicopter can be easily replaced
Ascending/Descending, Forward/Backward, Turn Left/Right, side fly to the left/right
Hovering and 360 Degree accurate positioning
Ready to Fly out of the box. All you need are 4 extra AA batteries for the transmitter

Specs

Length : 360mm
Width: 200mm
Height: 160mm
Motor: N50x 2
Helicopter Battery: 3.7v 800mAh Rechargeable LiPo (easily replaceable) 
Transmitter Battery: 4 x AA Batteries (sold separately)
Charging Time:  around 120 minutes
Flight Duration: around 5-7 minutes
Control Range: Up to 30m (66ft)

name: WL Toys V922 RC CCPM 6 Channel Flybarless Helicopter Ready to Fly
description:
The V922 is a six channel collective pitch flybarless helicopter created by WL Toys. It is an awesome machine packed into a small ready to fly package. We are amazed by this little machine and its capabilities. 

The V922 is equipped with a 3-Axis gyro that assists the pilot in flight stability. The flybarless rotor head is newly designed with main rotor blades that adds some weight to balance the helicopter. Additionally, the flybarless systems allows the CCPM rotor head to be simple and convenient in times of repair. 

Typically it is complicated to set up a six channel flybarless helicopter with a 3 axis flight control board. WL Toys has eliminated that complication in a ready to fly package for those who are transitioning to six channel collective pitch helicopters. Instead of messing with settings and other complicated parameters you can focus on your flight abilities right out of the box. 

The V922 has a unconventional way of allowing the pilots to fly inverted. There is a helpful function dubbed “Easy control”. You’ll find a switch on the top left hand corner of the transmitter. It helps you to keep the same direction control when flying inverted, so you won’t feel lost in orientation when performing inverted flight. Of course, some of you may feel that this is totally wrong and its pretty much cheating. If so, you can switch off easy control and fly inverted normally, or the hard way. 

WL Toys made this helicopter suitable and fun for a variety of pilots and toned down the exponential learning curve required to pilot these 6 channel collective pitch flybarless choppers. This V922 is the very best entry helicopter for new six channel pilots. Besides, this palm size helicopter is very durable for multiple light collisions. 

The V922 is great for pilots with experience and flight time with Co-Axial and Single Rotor Head helicopters. It is a very durable and stable six channel collective pitch helicopter.

Specifications:
Main rotor diameter : 250mm
Nose to tail length : 240mm
Tail rotor diameter : 38mm
Weight : 60g

This package includes :
WL Toys 2.4G Remote controller
Pre-assembled Helicopter
Battery Charger and cable (Powered by USB Cable)
2 X 3.7V 300mAh Li-Po Battery
Adjustment tool
Extra 1 Pair Blade
Extra 1 X Tail Rotor

The v911 is all about making the hobby fun, so it comes with two batteries, and a charger that can charge both at the same time. Charge either through a USB port or through the transmitter itself!

This detailed Drift King is beautifully designed and made in high strength metal frame, so it can survive more bumps and races than all other competitors. All advanced pilots are impressed with this new amazing helicopter, at the same time it is perfect for beginners to get into their new hobby.

It is able to fly freely in 6 directions, as a high performance infrared controller is included. Built in Gyroscope let it flies stably and smoothly, with easy to learn controls. Amazing flight distances, long battery life, stunningly durable, and Ready to Fly, you can get it up impressively in the sky faster and longer than other aircrafts.

name: UDI U809 Cobra Missile Launching 3.5 Channel Micro RC Helicopter w/ Gyro RTF
description:
Want a helicopter that can do more than just flying? How about throwing missiles too at your target? If so, then the innovative UDI U809 Cobra is your best choice! With two spring loaded missiles on each side, they are waiting to launch anytime with just a touch at your finger tip to the fire button. Missile Away!

This detailed 2011 version is beautifully designed and made in high strength plastic, so it can survive more bumps and fights than other competitors, at the same time perfect for beginners to get into their new hobby.

The U809 Cobra is able to fly freely in 6 directions, as a high-tech 4-in-1 infrared 3 Channel controller (Gyro+ ESC+Mixer+Receiver) is included. You can lock the throttle in any position, so it can hover and stay in the air impressively with your hands free. Also since it flies stably and quietly with its Camouflage color, you can take your time aiming at your target and fire away.

Features:

Designed for: Anyone over 8 years old 
Fly in the Dark: LED light installed at the front of the helicopter body. 
Fly in 6 directions: 
- Rotate Clockwise / Anti-Clockwise 
- Move Up / Down 
- Move Forward / Backward 
Missile System: Fire at anything two meters away 
Recharge Battery easily: From the transmitter or through a computer USB socket
I-Helicopter Adapter for Iphone & Android Device Capability (Sold Separately) ( Please install "udirc" App from the app store)

name: Syma RC X1 Aerobatic UFO Quadcopter 2.4Ghz 4 Channel
description:
Syma RC introduces its newest X1 Quadcopter! A quadcopter is a machine that is lifted and propelled by four rotors. Unlike most helicopters, a quadcopter use symmetrically pitched blades mounted on four motors to produce lift. Controlling the speed of these individual motors allows the machine to move forward and backward, up and down, strafe left and right, and rotate clockwise and counterclockwise. 

The Syma X1 4 Channel quadcopter brings a new element to radio control helicopters and offers a completely different experience of flying. It offers a refreshing change on how to hover, balance, and control a copter. With the help of an adjustable 3 axis gyro, stability and agility is achieved effortlessly. Flying the Syma helicopter is simple and intuitive allowing the pilot to enhance their skills quickly. Once you enhance your skills enough there are settings built in that you can disable to advance your ability to fly the X1.

With the use of 2.4ghz technology the Syma X1 radio system has the benefit of longer control distance, strong anti-interference technology, low power consumption, and rapid response times. The LCD screen displays helicopter trim data. The transmitter also allows you to choose between an “L” or “H” mode. This sets the sensitivity or “speed” of the controls and the motors. With the setting on “L” the X1 is less responsive and inherently more stable. With the setting on “H” mode the X1 is awaken and a lot more responsive. Additionally you can depress the top right button of the transmitter and activate the “Flip Mode” This feature deactivates some of the gyros that maintain stability and allows the pilot to perform flips and rolls. 

The Syma Helicopter brand is one that is very well known in the micro helicopter industry. Its S107 helicopter has been a hot item mainly because of its stability and ease of flight. The Syma X1 Quadcopter carries all of these favorable traits over from the S107 to produce a quadcopter in an awesome ready to fly package. 

The Syma X1 comes in 3 flavors. Each one looks completely different that the other. You have the choice of a UFO, Spacecraft, or a HoneyBee. 

Features:
3 way precision controller: up/down, left/right, forward/backward
Speed Increase Mode
360° Flip Mode
Two Fly Mode: Indoor/Outdoor
Built-in 3 Axis Gyro
Removable 3.7v 350mah Li-Po Battery

Specification: 
Product Battery: 3.7V 350mAh Li-Po
Charging Time: About 40 Minutes
Flight Time: About 5-6 Minutes
Controlling Distance: About 40 Meter
Frequency: 2.4ghz
Channel: 4 channels

Package Includes: 
1x 4CH 3-axis quadcopter 
1x 2.4G LCD remote
1x 3.7v 350mAh Li-Po battery 
1x USB Charger 
2x Main blades A 
2x Main blades B 
1x English Manual

name: Syma S107N 3 CH Micro Helicopter with Gyro and metal frame
description:
The Syma S107N is a high quality 3 channel mini indoor co-axial helicopter with a built-in gyro and a metal chassis frame. This model is miniature in size and its light weight makes it incredibly portable so you can take it anywhere you go. It also offers a wide infrared control and a design that is customized for indoor flying. For being only 19cm in length and weighing in at only 34grams, this mini helicopter packs a lot of power. The Syma S107N is controlled by a 32-Level high precision speed controller, it automatically stabilizes the rotor blade system for steady lift off.  The controller is shaped like video game console controllers so one can have a familiar ergonomic feel when it is held in the hand. Also, the high tenacity propellers are powered by 2 solid motors with a third motor in the tail rotor, which gives this machine the power you need. The Syma S107N comes with a high capability Li-Poly battery which is good for longer flight time, and can easily be recharged through the transmitter that is provided. The Syma S107N is a great model for any beginner, from kids to adults. Once you get the hang of flying one of these you are ready to step up to the next level.

Features:
Miniature size & light weight 
Super wide infrared control 
miniature design for indoor flying 
Controlled by 32-level high precision speed. 
Auto stable, rotor blade system for steady lifting-up 
3-Channel Helicopter movement forward / backward / up / down / left / right 
High tenacity propeller ? 
Charging and power indicator  
Nonintervention 2 bands 
High efficiency, driving motor, and surge power
 
Specifications:
Weight: 34g
Size: 220x38x98(mm)
Dimensions: main rotor diameter 190mm
Helicopter battery: 3.7v Rechargeable lithium polymer battery
Charging Time: 30-35 minutes
Flight Duration: 6-8 minutes
Frequency: Infrared control system - bands A, B & C
Control Specification: forward / backward / up / down / left / right
Range: Up to 10m (30ft)

name: SYMA S34 3CH Medium size Chinook RC HELICOPTER WITH GYRO
description:
Syma introduces its newest S34 3 channel coaxial mini chinook helicopter! If you are familiar or have flown the S fleet of choppers, you'll know exactly how stable it is! The new S34 is equipped with all the awesome features you’ll come to expect from Syma with new features such as flashing lights, bigger battery, and a 2.4ghz LCD transmitter. 

The S34 is 3 channel helicopter. This means that it can fly in 6 directions. It will maneuver Up/Down, Forward/Backward, and rotate clockwise and counterclockwise. The size of this chopper is suitable for indoor flight in smaller or confined spaces. Its coaxial rotor design is naturally stable in flight. Even beginners will find that it will control well. The built-in gyro is able to lock the heading and prevents continuous rotation of the helicopter chassis. The gyroscope is powerful and with the trim adjustment on the transmitter it can be adjusted in flight. What’s impressive is that the helicopter can hover in the air with your hands free from the transmitter. 

The radio system included in this package uses 2.4ghz frequency. With the use of spread spectrum technology, the control distance of the chopper is improved. Unlike infrared systems, you can fly this chopper without having to worry about glass, mirrors, or sunlight interfering with the signal. This type of frequency also allows more helicopters to be flown at the same time. The transmitter also has an LCD screen that displays trim and flight states of the helicopter. A high and low speed switch on the transmitter allows the pilot to control the throttle rate of the chopper for greater or less sensitivity. A 7.4v 500mah Lithium Polymer battery provides good power and about 6-8 minutes of flight time. 

Specifications:
Length: 46cm
Width: 8cm
Height: 18cm
Battery: 7.4v 500mah Li-Po
Frequency: 2.4ghz

Included in Box:
S34 Chinook 3 Channel Helicopter
Charger
Screwdriver
2.4ghz Transmitter (4 AA Batteries not included)
Operating Instructions

name: Syma S107C 3-channel Coaxial Mini Metal Spy Cam Helicopter
description:
Syma introduces its newest S107C 3 channel coaxial mini spy cam helicopter! If you are familiar or have flown the S107 fleet of choppers, you'll know exactly how stable it is! The new S107C is equipped with all the awesome features of the S107 but includes an additional spy camera, which can take videos and photos during flight. 


The S107C is 3 channel helicopter. This means that it can fly in 6 directions. It will maneuver Up/Down, Forward/Backward, and rotate clockwise and counterclockwise. The size of this chopper is suitable for indoor flight in smaller or confined spaces. Its coaxial rotor design is naturally stable in flight. Even beginners will find that it will control well. The built-in gyro is able to lock the heading and prevents continuous rotation of the helicopter chassis. The gyroscope is powerful and with the trim adjustment on the transmitter it can be adjusted in flight. What¡¦s impressive is that the helicopter can hover in the air with your hands free from the transmitter. 


This is the first camera helicopter presented by the Syma Factory. The package enables the pilot to record videos and capture photos while flying. The camera of S107C is removable allowing the pilot to reduce some weight and gain a bit of flying time. This feature also makes changing out the battery easier.Charging time for battery is 50-60 minutes and can flight time is approx 6-8 minutes. The helicopter can be charged by using transmitter or the USB cable. The transmitter uses 6 AA batteries which are not included.

SPECIFICATION

Model: syma S107C
Certifications: CE, ROHS, FCC, ASTM
Function: Up/down, Left/Right, Forward/Backward, Suspension, Accelerate, Light ON/OFF
Battery: 3.7V150mAh Li-polymer Battery
Charging time: about 50-60 minutes (USB charging)
Charging time by Transmitter: About 50-60 minutes
Flying time: about 6-8 minutes
Controlling distance: About 10 metres
Color: Red / Black / White
Control: Infrared
Video Format: 640 x 320 AVI

name: Double Horse 9118 Volitation 2.4G Radio Large Helicopter w/gyro
description:
This detailed Double Horse 9118 is beautifully designed and made in high strength airframe, so it can survive more bumps and races than all other competitors. All advanced pilots are impressed with this new amazing helicopter, at the same time it is perfect for beginners to get into their new hobby.

 

It is able to fly freely in 4 directions, as a high performance 3Ch 2.4Ghz controller is included. Interference is no longer a problem anymore, so it can fly stably and smoothly with easy to learn controls. Amazing flight distances, long battery life, stunningly durable, and Ready to Fly, you can get it up impressively in the sky faster and longer than other aircrafts. Grab one now before they all fly off the shelves!

Special Features

Function: Up and down, turn left and turn right, forward and backward
Rotor and Altitude Speed Control
Easy Landing Brake feature
Flight stabilizing system
MOPS (Motor Overload Protection System) 
High strength and lightweight metal frame
2.4GHz 3 Channel remote control
Ready to Fly

Specs

Helicopter Length/Width/Height: 62 cm x 10 cm x 25 cm
Package Length/Width/Height: 86 cm x 14 cm x 30 cm
Main Rotor Diameter: 535mm
Flight distance: About 100 meters high
Flight Time: about 8 mins
Helicopter Battery: 7.4V 1300 mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery

name: Double Horse 9104 Large 3CH Single Prop Helicopter w/Gyro
description:
9104 Doublehorse 3 Ch. RC Helicopter with Gyroscope
 
CONDITION: BRAND NEW IN BOX! READY TO FLY!
 
*Package Includes: 
1. Helicopter (FULLY ASSEMBLED)
2. 3 Ch. Remote Control
3. Rechargeable 7.4v Lipo Battery for Helicopter 
4. AC Wall Battery Charger
5. English Instruction Manual
  
Extra MAIN + TAIL BLADE

DESCRIPTION:
Full function 3 channel radio control (Left /Right,     Forward/Backward, Hover, and Lands) 
Real life Helicopter Styling
3 Channel digital proportional control
Built in Gyro for extra stability
Unique material withstands crashes
Newly designed super strong crashworthy propeller
Altitude and rotor speed control
Flight stabilizing System
Super lightwight airframe
Brake for easy landing
Up to 60m (200ft) radio control range
Ready to fly, easy to fly Complete kit, everything is included and 100% assembled - Only requiring 8 AA batteries for the radio transmitter to start flyng
Alloy structure, unique design
Advanced intelligent balance system
 
SPECS:
 
Main Motor Diameter: 535mm (21.06 inches) 
Fuselage Length: 710mm (27.95 inches) 
Fuselage height: 185mm (10.82 inches) 
Flying time: approx 10min Flying
height: approx 50m  Control range: 80m  Charging time: 150-180 min  Battery: 7.4v Lipo Battery

Length: 24"
